description.value:
Details standard Imperial Guard Arms, Attire, apparatus, equipment, policy, organisation, structure, and basic medical instructions. Also provides a guide to common foes of the Imperium. Required reading for all loyal Guardsman.

Requirements

HB: Character can make Common Lore (Imperial Guard, Imperium, or Xenos) Test as Full Action (Concentration), if fail can still pass test but requires +1 Full Action per DoF

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: -
